title: 2 BR Apt, 3rd fl Walk Up, St George  $1750 incl Heat & HW
map_address: Daniel low terrace near Benziger Ave
posting_body: ['Walk Straight Up to this Bright and Airy "Penthouse" apartment on the 3rd fl above Owner.', 'This 2 Bedroom Apartment has high ceilings , Beautiful Harbor views, and a small galley kitchen.', 'Owner Landlord lives on 1st and 2nd fl of this 2 Family Victorian House in St George, Staten Island with Easy Access to the City.. 10 min Walk to Ferry and all major Transportation, and Empire Outlet Mall.', 'Landlord feels that the stairway to the 3rd fl is a little too dangerous for small children, but you are welcome to come and look and decide for yourself..', 'Small Pet Ok, but Absolutely No Smoking of any kind allowed on the property.', '$1750 Includes Heat,  Hot Water, and Cold Water too, (which is Not Free..).', 'Tenant pays Elec and Cooking Gas.', '3x the Rent Required.', 'Must submit application to Landlord along with supporting documents: paystubs or letter from employment, bank statements, W2s, Credit score,  and Rent payment history.', 'Call CeCe at  917-292-4980(C)', 'from United National Realty']
